Driver

 30 Aug 2009

Over the past 24 hours Iâ€™ve worked (not constantly, in bursts) on a little Sinatra app called Driver. My inspiration for this was that Passenger Preference Pane was hanging in Mac OS X. Driver acts as an alternative to Passenger Preference Pane and it was a fun little project I did to see if it was possible, and it is. Now your challenge is to get it to work with Linux. Go for it!
